Rules

Welcome to this amazing game to evaluate your math skills. This game was written by Makhabat to help you learn more about math! The game rules are simple. All you have to do is write your name, so we can save your results and display it for you! Then, you get to choose between two options!

Time attack will measure your abilty to solve math equations in 2 minutes! Your best score then, will go to the LeaderBoard! You will be able to see it after the timer is up!

Practice game is for you to practice with Unlimited time! You can finish the game by just pressing the button-Finish the game! You can also see your result at the end and we will save your best result in our LeaderBaord!

We also provide different levels! It gets harder on higher levels!Your answer can be positive or negative! Just input it and press enter!Hope you enjoy this game and we would love to hear any feedback!Just one step away to become a Math Ninja!
